title: Baoxiao Gongfu
synopsis: In the beautiful land of China, there are three kind and lively children Yuanlong, Yuanfu and Yuanxiong. The three children united and loved each other and helped each other. They used the Chinese martial arts they learned to promote the good quality of being helpful to help the villagers through various difficulties. They encountered many dangerous things in solving the difficulties. They fought bravely and finally , So that the villagers continue to live a happy life (translated from iqiyi)
